Ext.define('es.view.local-table-name.Add', {
	extend: 'Ext.window.Window',
	alias: 'widget.lcObjPLocalTableNameAdd',
	id: 'local-table-name-add',
	height: 300,
	width: 369,
	resizable: true,
	autoScroll: true,
	title: 'Add UcObjSLocalTableName',
	modal: true,

	initComponent: function () {
		var me = this;

		setTimeout(()=> {
			Ext.getCmp('createdAt').setValue(new Date());
			Ext.getCmp('updatedAt').setValue(new Date());
			Ext.getCmp('dueAt').setValue(new Date());
		}, 50);

		//<es-section>
		<<<extjsFieldNotRelated>>>
		var storeUcObjPForeignTableNameUcObjlocalStoreFieldNameWithUcObjForeignStoreFieldNameWithLabel = new Ext.data.JsonStore({
			proxy: {
				type: 'ajax',
				url : '/api-#systemName/local-table-name/findUcObjPForeignTableNameUcObjlocalStoreFieldNameWithUcObjForeignStoreFieldNameWithLabel',
				reader: {
					type: 'json',
					root: 'data'
				},
			},
			fields: ['foreign_store_field_name_value', 'foreign_store_field_name_label'],
			root: 'data',
			autoLoad: true
		});
		>>>extjsFieldNotRelated<<<
		//</es-section>
		Ext.applyIf(me, {
			items: [
				{
					xtype: 'form',
					id:'local-table-name-form',
					bodyPadding: 20,
					title: '',
					defaults: { // defaults are applied to items, not the container
						allowBlank: false,
						allowOnlyWhitespace: false,
						msgTarget: 'side',
						xtype: 'textfield',
						anchor: '100%'
					},
					items: [
						//<es-section>
						<<<extjsFieldString>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_primary_field_name',
							name: 'local_primary_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldString<<<
						<<<extjsFieldBigint>>>
          				{
     		        		fieldLabel: 'local_bigint_field_name',
    						name: 'local_bigint_field_name',
     					},
                        >>>extjsFieldBigint<<<
						<<<extjsFieldBool>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_boolean_field_name',
							name: 'local_boolean_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldBool<<<
						<<<extjsFieldInteger>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_integer_field_name',
							name: 'local_integer_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldInteger<<<
						<<<extjsFieldVarchar>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_varchar_field_name',
							name: 'local_varchar_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldVarchar<<<
						<<<extjsFieldText>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_text_field_name',
							name: 'local_text_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldText<<<
						<<<extjsFieldBlob>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_blob_field_name',
							name: 'local_blob_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldBlob<<<
						<<<extjsFieldChar>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_char_field_name',
							name: 'local_char_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldChar<<<
						<<<extjsFieldFloat>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_float_field_name',
							name: 'local_float_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldFloat<<<
						<<<extjsFieldDecimal>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_decimal_field_name',
							name: 'local_decimal_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldDecimal<<<
						<<<extjsFieldDouble>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_double_field_name',
							name: 'local_double_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldDouble<<<
						<<<extjsFieldTinyint>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_tinyint_field_name',
							name: 'local_tinyint_field_name',
						},
						>>>extjsFieldTinyint<<<
						<<<extjsFieldIndex>>>
						{
							xtype: new Ext.form.field.ComboBox({
								name: 'local_index_field_name',
								id: 'local_index_field_name',
								fieldLabel: 'local_index_field_name',
								store: storeUcObjPForeignTableNameUcObjlocalStoreFieldNameWithUcObjForeignStoreFieldNameWithLabel,
								valueField: "foreign_store_field_name_value",
								displayField: "foreign_store_field_name_label",
							})
						},
						>>>extjsFieldIndex<<<
						<<<extjsFieldDate>>>
						{
							fieldLabel: 'local_date_field_name',
							name: 'local_date_field_name',
							id:'local_date_field_name',
							xtype: 'datefield',
							format: 'yy/m/d H:i:s',
							minValue: new Date(),
						},
						>>>extjsFieldDate<<<
						//</es-section>
						{
							xtype: 'button',
							anchor: 0,
							itemId: 'save',
							text: 'Save'
						},
						{
							xtype: 'button',
							anchor: 0,
							itemId: 'cancel',
							text: 'Cancel'
						}
					]
				}
			]
		});

		me.callParent(arguments);
	},
});
